page.title: 17The Village Hall
page.content: The Village Hall is used by Uffington Womens Institute on the first Wednesday of each month.The Girl Guides meet there each Thursday evening_they also join up with Bainton and Ashton Guides for visits and summer camps.The local Brass Band practice there every Tuesday night and the Youth Club use the Hall each Friday and Sunday for snooker,pool, billiards and table tennis.Youth Club age limits are 12-21years.Many private parties and discos are also held there.At the back of the hall is a Kitchen and a billard room.An extension is being planned because space is limited and half of the proceeds from this years village fete will go towards this project.This quaint Village Hall is one of the few remaining thatched roofed village buildings.
